title: Overcoming Neck and Back Pain
creator_credit: G Roberts, Garry Egger and Centre for Health Promotion and Research
brief_description: Produced by a panel of back care experts in co-operation with the Royal Australian College of GP’s, this video is designed to provide information about back pain as well as a comprehensive exercise routine for dealing with and preventing back pain. Section 1: Basic back structure; Section 2: Day to day back care Section 3: Exercise routine.
